messages.subject: Re: Ren!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Ren, I just picked up the magazine today.  I was shopping with Darcy and saw it, so I found the article and showed her the photo. She said, That s Ren!
messages.messageBody:
Hey Ren, I just picked up the magazine today. I was shopping with
Darcy and saw it, so I found the article and showed her the photo.
She said, "That's Ren!" and the next thing she said was "That's
Jalen??!!" We still remember him as that adorable little toddler who
was always going "ssthh".

It was nice to see the photo of you and your family. I thought the
article was too short and didn't say all that much, but hopefully it
will get the attention of some people who have never heard of
unschooling before.

-Christy

messages.subject: Re: Ren!!!
messages.msgSnippet: I read your article while I was waiting in line at the grocery store today.  I thought it was a very good article, and showed unschooling in a very positive
messages.messageBody:
I read your article while I was waiting in line at the grocery store
today. I thought it was a very good article, and showed unschooling
in a very positive light...which is unusual. ;) How did you get to
do it? Did comeone from the magazine contact you, or did you get in
touch with them...or??? I really couldn't figure out the saw in the
front of the picture...what WAS it doing there? Something about an
interest someone has? I wish you would tell us all about doing it...
:)
Paige

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Ren!!!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/16/2006 5:16:05 P.M. Central Daylight Time, htowens35@verizon.net writes: which  people edition? I would like to read it. May 22nd  it has
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/16/2006 5:16:05 P.M. Central Daylight Time,
htowens35@... writes:

which people edition? I would like to read it.


May 22nd it has brooke shields with both her kids on the cover. Ren's
article is page 141

~Alyssa
Slightly crunchy, non-vaxing, unschooling Mom to Landen(2 1/2) and Gage(7
months)

"Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Ren!!!
messages.msgSnippet: which people edition? I would like to read it. Tywane The way for a person to rise is to improve themselves every way they can, never suspecting that anybody
messages.messageBody:
which people edition? I would like to read it.

Tywane

The way for a person to rise is to improve themselves every way they can, never suspecting that anybody wishes to hinder them. - Abraham Lincoln -


----- Original Message ----
From: Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2006 5:37:31 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Ren!!!

" Congratulations for bringing unschooling to a wider
market!!"

Well technically, the writers and editors did that!:) I was just their
poster child. lol

LeaAnn called today yelling at me "YOU'RE in People, why didn't you
TELL ME???!!" She picked up a ton of copies to bring home if anyone
in P'cola wants one.

On that note, a radio show out of Chicago called me today and asked if
I was willing to be interviewed for their show tomorrow morning (they
saw the People article). It's on WLUP in Chicago (the Johnnie B show)
and their focus this week is education.

If anyone can figure out the affiliates for their area, you could hear
it live. I don't know what time they'll do the interview, sometime
between 7am-10am Eastern time.

And hey, if someone would record it, I'd be MOST grateful. Queanna?

Ren
learninginfreedom.com







YAHOO! GROUPS LINKS

Visit your group "unschoolingbasics" on the web.

unschoolingbasics-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
